attributes.action: That the people call a vote of no confidence in the Coalition Government for passing the Nhs bill with no Mandate .
attributes.additional_details:
We the People of this nation wanted to be consulted over such a fundamental change to our NHS and
.There is no Mandate so we call for a Vote of No Confidence in the Coalition Government.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament and not the Government.
